attributes.action: reduce 40% tax to all workers in the skilled area's such as utilities workers electricity industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a skilled electrical technician within the electrical industry which is so important to the welfare, economy, industry, of the British people we are over taxed used and exploited the people. you should of controlled the bankers that have made there big bonuses and over budgeted wages its a disgrace that no one has helped the hard working families what are the government going to do for us and where are my share certificates for my part of the banks that i helped out of finance ruin 
can you tell me what benefits i can claim i am on fix rate mortgage and paying over the odds
